title: Spam
description: These papers have been marked as spam and won't appear in the main list, but are kept to prevent re-downloading.
emptyDescription: No papers have been marked as spam
restoreConfirm: Are you sure you want to restore this paper?
restoreAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to restore all papers?
permanentDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this paper? This action cannot be undone.
selectPapers: Select papers to perform batch operations
restoreAllMessage: Are you sure you want to restore all {{count}} papers? They will reappear in the main list.
permanentDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this paper? This action cannot be undone.
clearAllMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all {{count}} spam papers? This action cannot be undone.
batchRestoreMessage: Are you sure you want to restore {{count}} selected papers?
batchDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to permanently delete {{count}} selected papers? This action cannot be undone.
